KPIBag.Text: 活动告警统计(按告警等级)
KPIBag.Tag: ChartType=Pie&ChartTitle=活动告警统计(按告警等级)

KPIBag.Text: 设备活动告警等级分布

KPIBag.QueryString: SELECT (SELECT EquipmentName FROM TBL_Equipment WHERE EquipmentId = A.EquipmentId limit 1) AS 'EquipmentName',count(B.EventSeverityId) AS 'AlarmCount' FROM TBL_ActiveSignal A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_ActiveEvent B ON A.EquipmentId = B.EquipmentId GROUP BY A.EquipmentId,A.FloatValue,A.Meanings

SELECT (SELECT EquipmentName FROM TBL_Equipment WHERE EquipmentId = A.EquipmentId limit 1) AS 'EquipmentName',2*(A.FloatValue)-1 AS 'State' FROM TBL_ActiveSignal A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_ActiveEvent B ON A.EquipmentId = B.EquipmentId GROUP BY A.EquipmentId,A.FloatValue,A.Meanings
KPIBag.Text: 设备通讯状态(1表示正常,-1表示断开)
